place.name: CHILTON CANDOVER
place.gazetteerText: CANDOVER-CHILTON, a parish in Alresford district, Hants; on the river Itchen, 5 miles N of New Alresford r. station, and 9½ NE of Winchester. Post Town, Brown-Candover, under Mitcheldever station. Acres, 1,472. Real property, £691. Pop., 142. Houses, 21. The property all belongs to Lord Ashburton. The living is a rectory, annexed to the rectory of Brown-Candover, in the diocese of Winchester. The church is ancient, small, and good.- (In 1870-72, John Marius Wilson's Imperial Gazetteer of England and Wales)
